c74object.name: tap.pulserouter~
c74object.digest: Generate pulses from a ramp and a buffer~
c74object.description: tap.pulserouter~ generates pulses for up to 5 different processes by scanning through a buffer. The buffer stores bits that are used to trigger a pulse on a specific outlet. One application for this is triggering grains in granular synthesis (e.g. in conjunction with Nathan Wolek's Granular ToolKit).

objarg.name: buffer
objarg.description: buffer to loop through, with sample values triggering pulse outputs
